summary: Take That is an English pop group formed in 1990 with original members Gary Barlow, Howard Donald, Mark Owen, Jason Orange, and Robbie Williams. They had many number-one singles and albums in the UK and internationally, winning eight Brit Awards and an Ivor Novello Award. Williams left in 1995, but the band reunited in 2006 without him. They achieved new success, and Williams rejoined in 2010 for their fastest-selling album. The group has sold over 45 million records worldwide and holds records for the fastest-selling tour in the UK.
title: Take That
